^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

UserName.description: The user name for the SNMPv3 account when Protocol is SNMPv3.
UserName.longDescription: This property shall contain the user name for this account when Protocol is SNMPv3.

SMTPSubject.description: The string for the SMTP Subject when Protocol is SMTP.
SMTPSubject.longDescription: This property shall contain the SMTP Subject when Protocol is SMTP.

EnableSubscription.description: An indication of whether a event subscription is enabled
EnableSubscription.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the event subscription is enabled.

Severity.longDescription: This property shall contain the severity of the event, as defined in the 'Status' clause of the Redfish Specification.

enumDescriptions.Critical: A critical condition requires immediate attention.
